description.value:
Mental blocks prevent your immense inborn psychic energies from flowing freely. They are unleashed only when you suffer pain.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ijtqp1h3hka5kive]{Persuasive Goad} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jy64xofud29j5ju6]{Pain Strike} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3efy1ico48ccrzni]{Vampiric Touch} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1dkzhi78je32sbrr]{Pain Strike, Mass} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4jddpsd5pkky0qjg]{Synapse Overload} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nqrpfidjuzllqa9z]{Inflict Pain, Mass} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9f3hf9h3j8q8062b]{Waves of Exhaustion} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{Horrid Wilting} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6yeorbvt5ysym3nh]{Suffocation, Mass} (18th).
